info.title: Kithward API
info.description:
# Kithward API

### Authentication

Before making any authenticated requests you should signup first and get a valid Token.


##### _POST_

> **/v1/auth/login**


**body**

```json
{
      "email": "your_username",
      "password": "your_password"
}
```

**response**

```json
{
    "id": "66",
    "email": "fa@novalid.com",
    "meta": {
        "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhY2NvdW50X2lkIjo2NiwiYWNjb3VudF9uYW1lIjoiU29tZSBQZXJzb24iLCJpc19hZG1pbiI6dHJ1ZSwiZXhwIjoxNTY3Nzc4MTk4fQ.cKNOxwOKw-IxHzvD-FnwnTocTNa8dgkq-dReC0G6tZE",
        "refresh_token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhY2NvdW50X2lkIjo2NiwiZGlnZXN0IjoiZDY0NGZiZjk4OWY1NWI0MDQ3NDMyYWY0YWM3OTNiY2U3NWRjZWJlZSIsImV4cCI6MTYzMDg1MDE5OH0._5q-jhVw_7A6LMgoDo9sWaVROaCo7OySE4ukp8TxwQA"
    },
    "name": "Some Person",
    "role": "admin"
}
```
---

The desired Token is in the response object `meta > access_token`

After obtaining it, add it to Swagger authentication.

![Sample](/auth.png)

---

parameters.name: community_id
parameters.description: Could either be the community id or slug
